p: The results of the pilot survey are shown in Table 1. Three of 50 milk tanker samples were positive for the virus, based on RT-PCR. Among these positive samples, two positive samples were detected in the samples from milk tankers with a maximum capacity of 4.2–6.7 t, and one sample was detected in the samples from milk tankers with a maximum capacity of 10.5–13.5 t.
